BodyName: Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the disclosure of gratuity policies for food delivery workers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Disclosure of gratuity policies for food delivery workers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing general provisions related to working conditions for third-party service workers and requiring that third-party food delivery services permit delivery workers to set limitations on distance and route for deliveries
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing general provisions related to working conditions for third-party service workers and requiring that third-party food delivery services permit delivery workers to set limitations on distance and route for deliveries.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring third-party food delivery services and third-party courier services to provide food delivery workers with insulated food delivery bags, and authorizing the commissioner of the department of consumer and worker protection to deny, suspend, revoke or refuse to renew a license for violations of chapter 15 of title 20 of such code
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring third-party food delivery services and third-party courier services to provide food delivery workers with insulated food delivery bags, and authorizing the commissioner of the department of consumer and worker protection to deny, suspend, revoke

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing minimum per trip payments to third-party food delivery service and third-party courier service workers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to limitations on distance and route for food delivery workers; to amend three local laws for the year 2021 amending the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to providing food delivery workers with insulated food delivery bags and denying, suspend, revoking or refusing to renew a license for a third party delivery service, minimum per trip payments to third-party food delivery service and courier service workers, and standards for payment of food delivery workers, respectively, as proposed in introduction numbers 2288-A, 2294-A, and 2296-A, respectively; and in relation to requiring a study of the working conditions for food delivery workers
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Limitations on distance and route for food delivery workers; to amend three local laws for the year 2021.
